abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Used by a Psychic-type move, or a move stolen by Thief or Delta Sneak. Nullifies opponents' moves without using an additional turn.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.description: This Pokémon's Speedboost doesn't take effect if its quicker opponent never takes the turn (e.g. when the opponent is using an ability to prevent the target from being the active Pokémon).
